title: (x) Formaat Notarissen - Weiss, Flange {Bertjan, Mike Y}
content:
Need to recreate this logo.   
These are the fonts i found:   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20050826073026im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/22646.jpg)   
   
(also tried Cantoria and Della Robbia)
author: bert

comments.content: I think the Weiss choice is right, but the other two might be different weights of one font family. I think it is Flange.
Here is a link to see the different weights At [Phils Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20050826073026/http:/www.philsfonts.com/showing.html?sku=BQ901060X1P1&start=1).
Thats it ! thanks a lot Mike.
